file_content.text: Don't be in such a hurry, Blade. Don't you remember me? Your old buddy, Dheno Rey?
I don't think you looked this good when we met up on Hoth--or so girly. But you couldn't be an imposter--you know your friend Dheno.
You haven't aged well since we met up on Hoth. Your nose... and your skin! But you couldn't be an imposter--you know your friend Dheno.
Of course I remember you, Dheno. How long's it been?
My old buddy....
Little too long, it seems. Turns out we've got a problem.
Sorry. I'm pretty sure we've never met.
I don't know you.
Ah, then we have a problem.
Get out of my way. I'm doing business with Nem'ro now.
Don't bother me.
Yeah, I'm hearing a lot about the Red Blade's visit to Hutta--which puts me in a bind.
You see, you don't look like the Blade I know--the Blade who owes me credits.
But you say you're the Blade, my pretty lady friend, so I'll take you at your word--and ask for my money. You understand?
I thought we were close, Dheno. I thought you were my very, very close friend.
[Flirt] Don't you like me?
Yeah... I can see that. But come on--I really do need the cash if I'm gonna keep your secret.
But you say you're the Blade, so I'll take you at your word--and ask for my money. You understand?
Maybe we can deal. How much money are we talking about?
What do you want?
Let's see, I could factor in interest, what you did to my ship--but that's not how pals do things.
Back off, Dheno--don't make me hurt you.
You're pushing it.
Right. I don't think so.
I don't know where the real Blade is, and I don't care. But if you want me to keep your secret, I need enough credits to keep me comfortable.
Is that enough? Take your money and get out of here.
Take some of my credits.
Good call. Been a pleasure seeing you again, Blade.
Sorry, Dheno, but I just don't have the money right now.
I'm broke.
Well, I tried being nice--but I guess I'll just have to kill you and take whatever you've got.
You're bluffing. You wouldn't dare say anything.
You won't talk.
You think? Well, you're right--talking does make things complicated.
But if I kill you before you can run back to Nem'ro, I bet I can figure the scam you're pulling. And the Hutt'll pay me nicely.
Come on, you're a good guy. You'd take a girl's last few credits? Leave her broke and wanting?
[Flirt] Be nice to a lady.
Look, maybe I could let the debt slide just this once... for a "friend." Dheno and the Blade, you know?
I'd really appreciate that, Dheno.
Excellent.
I like the sound of that. I like it a lot, Dheno.
[Flirt] We go well together.
Glad to hear it. You know, we could head to my room, get cozy, talk about old times... we've got a lot in common, you and me.
Tempting--but I have other business. Maybe we can catch up another day?
No thanks.
Sure, another time. I'll even keep your secret. No one can say I wasn't good to you....
All right--so long as I can finish my business here when we're done.
Sounds like fun.
I won't stop you. Come on--I'll show you a few things to really remember me by....
I don't think so. You know what? I really don't need this.
Forget it.
Really, Dheno--don't do me any favors.
Moron.
Fine. You asked for it--I'm gonna take my credits after all.
I don't have a choice. I can't let you talk.
You forced my hand. [Attack]
I understand, all right. You're a rat who needs to die.
You scum. [Attack]
Is that so? Let's see what you can do, "Blade."
You don't bother me, I don't bother you, all right?
